abstract: Cellphones, with their e-mails, to-do lists and calendar appointments, may make you feel as if everything in life is scheduled down to the last minute, leaving little room for, say, an impulsive trip out of town. But an app called HotelTonight is based on the idea that smartphones are ideal for creating last-minute plans.
